code: protected String description() {     return exception != null ? exception.getClass().getCanonicalName() : "ref:" + ref. }

comment: /**  * Reference to the exception instance to lookup from the registry to throw  */
code: /**  * Reference to the exception instance to lookup from the registry to throw  */ public void setRef(String ref) {     this.ref = ref. }
public void setException(Exception exception) {     this.exception = exception. }

comment: /**  * To create a new exception instance and use the given message as caused message (supports simple language)  */
code: /**  * To create a new exception instance and use the given message as caused message (supports simple language)  */ public void setMessage(String message) {     this.message = message. }

comment: /**  * The class of the exception to create using the message.  *  * @see #setMessage(String)  */
code: /**  * The class of the exception to create using the message.  *  * @see #setMessage(String)  */ public void setExceptionType(String exceptionType) {     this.exceptionType = exceptionType. }
public Class<? extends Exception> getExceptionClass() {     return exceptionClass. }

comment: /**  * The class of the exception to create using the message.  *  * @see #setMessage(String)  */
code: /**  * The class of the exception to create using the message.  *  * @see #setMessage(String)  */ public void setExceptionClass(Class<? extends Exception> exceptionClass) {     this.exceptionClass = exceptionClass. }
